column1: How effectively did the player introduce the devices and explain their ports?
How clearly did the player explain the purpose of the ports?
How effectively did the player set up the hardware connections?
column5: Missed some steps (e.g forget to switch on wifi, did not properly connect LAN port) with no narration
column6: Able to fix correctly with clear narration

column1: How efficiently did the player search for and identify the correct printers within the system?
column5: Search for printer but unable to locate (E.g LAN port not properly fixed) with/without narration
column6: Able to fix correctly with clear narration

column1: How accurately did the player complete the setup process, ensuring everything was configured and functioning properly?
column6: Able to setup correctly and all printers working

column1: Did the player demonstrate the ability to conduct the Feed test and accurately interpret the results?
column4: Was not able to perform feed test
column5: Feed test performed but no narration
column6: Performed Feed test and clear narration

column1: Did the player follow the correct steps to reset the printer successfully?
column5: Reset but printer did not work/no narration

column1: Did the player successfully configure the printer?
column6: Successfully understood the combination and configured the printer.

column1: After configuration, did the player manage to reassign the printer?
column6: Successfully reassigned the printer after configuration.
